name: Festival Jajanan Bango 2022
description: Maintaining the culinary festival website involves utilizing CodeIgniter. The site showcases a variety of Indonesian culinary delights, enabling visitors to explore the offerings available at the festival this year.

name: Hino Finance
description: Hino's financial website serves as a platform for company profiling, e-commerce functionalities, and notably, financial product offerings marketed by the company.

name: MGM Bosco Logistics
description: Develop a responsive company profile interface using the Vue.js framework. On the MGM Bosco Sustainability page, incorporate bright blue colors in specific sections to give it a fresher appearance.

name: Danamon Optimal
description: The DanamonOptimalku website serves as a company profile and is developed solely as a static Single Page Application (SPA).

name: Danamon Microsite Quiz
description: Danamon has developed a multiple-choice quiz website for users. Upon completing the quiz, users will be prompted to enter various personal details. The final result, displayed on a mobile device, will reveal a character corresponding to the user's choices throughout the quiz. Each character will vary based on the user's responses.

name: 30 Resep Semur Semangatkan Sahur
description: It's a recommendation website featuring special dishes for the month of Ramadan. Users can explore full reviews embedded from Instagram stories for each dish.

name: Indonesia International Motor Show
description: Danamon has entrusted me with the task of creating a microsite for the Indonesia International Motor Show.

name: Danamon Spekta
description: The mockup I created for Danamon Spekta closely resembles other projects, emphasizing simplicity and highlighting the offered products. Additionally, Danamon Spekta is designed as a Single Page Application.

name: Danamon Booking Optimalku
description: It's a company website consultation aimed at streamlining the process for users to request a queue number, ask questions, or seek consultation without the need to physically visit. The user's inquiries or consultations will be sent via email to the registered email address.

name: Danamon's Anniversary
description: For its 67th birthday, Danamon invites customers to celebrate together through a special Danamon birthday website on July 16, 2023. Alongside the celebration, Danamon offers various special deals, including video examples showcasing the JavaScript concept on tablet displays.

name: Ristra Revamp
description: In this project, my task is to perform a "Technology Migration" by revamping the website from an old machine to a new one. I will focus on installing and ensuring that the appearance closely resembles the previous version.

name: D-Bank PRO
description: We're adapting our strategy to meet the specific preferences of our valued client, Danamon. They want the website to offer visitors a fresh user experience different from what they've seen before. Our goal is to create a memorable and engaging interaction that leaves a lasting impression on users as they explore the platform.

name: Festival Jajanan Bango 2023
description: The Bango snack festival returns, presenting an array of Indonesian culinary delights for visitors to enjoy and explore during this year's event.

name: Walls Feast Pop
description: Design a captivating mobile interface to enhance user experience and streamline registration or support for one of two characters. Keep the project agile and prioritize simplicity for efficient development and deployment.

name: Jiva GreenHope
description: As a Full Stack Developer at JIVACO, our company specializes in producing top-notch products for everyday use, including premium rice, cooking oil, and sugar. We've designed a user-friendly UI with a clean and simple interface, offering an interactive experience for users. Our primary color theme is green, symbolizing nature and our commitment to eco-friendly products, aligning with JIVACO's brand identity.

name: Danamon Hadiah Beruntun
description: Employing a minimalist design with Danamon's signature orange color, we'll enhance the interface with an additional gif.
